OCD.name: Premises EID Reader Gateway
OCD.description: Gateway between Tracker Premises RFID readers and iRouter. Picks up tag id reads from configured readers and produces iRouter animal ids.

AD.name: Wiring group name
AD.description: Name of the group of components that will be wired together.

AD.name: Event Topics
AD.description: Default event topics. Do not change.

AD.name: Reader Filter
AD.description: Event filter to restrict reception of reads from certain Tracker RFID readers. Example: (com.verticon.tracker.reader.name=*:My Reader Name)

AD.name: Producer scope
AD.description: The produced scope containing the animal EIDs. (Use full scope names)
